title: Mauls
content:
Mauls in Baldur's Gate 3 are pieces of equipment that are used to inflict damage against hostile characters such as Enemies and Bosses. Mauls are Two-Handed Martial Weapons in BG3 that can only be two-handed, dealing 2-12 Damage without enchantments. They have a range of 1.5m, and they deal Bludgeoning Damage, though some special Mauls also deal another type of Damage as well.
